name: Evacuation Control (V)
Lore: '''Give the evacuation code signal...and get to your transports!''',
Text: 'Deploy on table; shuffle your Reserve Deck, peek at top three cards, and stack them face-up here. During battle, may take a card here into hand to prevent all battle destiny draws from being modified or canceled (each player may draw no more than one battle destiny). (Immune to Alter.)',
